Class EditServerGUI

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EditServerGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class present a simple Gridlayout so the user can edit informasion about an existing server.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lap
See Also:
JPanel, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

EditServerGUI

public EditServerGUI(SortedServers sortedServers,
                     javax.swing.JComboBox info,
                     int first,
                     int second,
                     javax.swing.JInternalFrame myWindow)
Constructor for this class. It will create a Gridbaglayout with the needed Textfield to display and allow the user to change the server information.

Parameters:
sortedServers - Object of sorted servers
info - The object of the dropdownbox that contains the servers under the same group
first - An Integer that tells witch slot this server has in the first array of the two-dimensionarray
second - An Integer that tells witch slot this server has in the Second array of the two-dimensionarray
myWindow - Which frame does this belong to
